top_stories.title: Ex-Google Executive Peeyush Ranjan Launches AI EdTech Startup Fermi.ai in India & USA
top_stories.description: Former Google GM and VP Peeyush Ranjan has launched Fermi.ai, an AI-first edtech startup aimed at transforming high-school STEM education across India and the United States. Headquartered in Singapore, the company is rolling out its learning platform through subsidiaries in both countries, beginning with mathematics, physics and chemistry. Fermi.ai is built around what the company […] The post Ex-Google Executive Peeyush Ranjan Launches AI EdTech Startup Fermi.ai in India & USA appeared first...

top_stories.title: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with AI agents
top_stories.description: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with Codex, an AI software agent embedded in workflows to speed builds, automate defect fixes, and enable AI-native development.
top_stories.content: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with Codex, an AI software agent embedded in workflows to speed builds, automate defect fixes, and enable AI-native development.

top_stories.title: Flight Controls Are Cleared for Takeoff on GeForce NOW
top_stories.description: The wait is over, pilots. Flight control support — one of the most community-requested features for GeForce NOW — is live starting today, following its announcement at CES earlier this month. Virtual captains can now bring dedicated flight gear into the cloud and feel every roll, yaw and throttle change with even more precision, starting Read Article
